Every body is a yoga body

A path for all

I extend the transformative practice of Vinyasa Flow, Hatha & Yin Yoga for people of all backgrounds and levels of experience. Meeting each individual where they are today, I share my dedication and love of practice to those inspired and willing. Together we come to our mats expecting nothing and in turn experiencing everything.

“If we practice the science of yoga, which is useful to the entire human community and which yields happiness both here and hereafter – if we practice it without fail, we will then attain physical, mental and spiritual happiness, and our minds will flood towards the Self.”
– Sri K. Pattabhi Jois

Upcoming/featured retreat

Location: Bodrum, Turkey

Dates: 17-23 october 2020

Join me on this wonderful 7 night retreat onboard a traditional wooden Gulet yacht. We sail along the Turkish coastline where the Mediterranean meets the Aegean Sea and experience multiple on-land and water activities as well as the rich Mediterranean culture.

Community

My Mission: to make yoga a mindfulness practice affordable and accessible to all! No paid subscriptions or membership dues, just you, your mat and a bottle of water! I do not ask for money, however I do accept donations that most likely will be donated to non-profit organizations. I'll try to make everyone comfortable and safe within their skill level and ability to do yoga. No one is required to do or to try any pose, and everyone is expected to practice safety and to stay within their own physical limits. The benefits from practicing yoga do not require competition or perfection. The benefits from practicing yoga come from maintaining and enhancing your body's ability to move, to stay flexible, and to experience the free flow of energy & light within. Namaste
